channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside 3 Procter Street, 27th July
item.description:
Stk skin care business has fixed wooden cage advertising hoardings more than 6 feet high around 2 of the street trees ( and another around a street sign post ).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Catton Street, Holborn, London

item.title: Many lights not working, 27th July
item.description:
There are several streetlights on the pavements, and several lamps in the park fencing, which were not working when I walked through recently at night. Most noticeably the one near the new Mandarin Oriental Hotel, further than the zebra crossing light, was not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Brook Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road cracks and defects the whole of Harding road, 27th July
item.description:
The whole of Harding road from top to bottom has road cracks, road defects in the middle of the road, cracks transverse the road from left to right and there dips in the road. Presents hazard risk to cars and concerns to the road, pavement and our properties. Please check it's not subsidence related.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harding Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: LIght not functioning., 27th July
item.description:
The light attached to Number 23 Romilly Street is not working and has been out for some time I think. Please can you change light bulb asap as we have a lot of drug users etc at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Romilly Street, London
